Metrics¶

Methods Summary

u8timeseries.metrics.mape(true_series, …)

Computes the Mean Absolute Percentage Error (MAPE) of true_series and pred_series.

u8timeseries.metrics.mase(true_series, …)

Computes the Mean Absolute Scaled Error (MASE) of true_series and pred_series.

u8timeseries.metrics.overall_percentage_error(…)

Computes the Overall Percentage Error (OPE) of true_series and pred_series.

Methods Documentation

u8timeseries.metrics.mape(true_series: u8timeseries.timeseries.TimeSeries, pred_series: u8timeseries.timeseries.TimeSeries) → float[source]¶

Computes the Mean Absolute Percentage Error (MAPE) of true_series and pred_series.

Parameters

  • true_series – The series to match.

  • pred_series – The predicted values.

Returns

The computed MAPE.

u8timeseries.metrics.mase(true_series: u8timeseries.timeseries.TimeSeries, pred_series: u8timeseries.timeseries.TimeSeries) → float[source]¶

Computes the Mean Absolute Scaled Error (MASE) of true_series and pred_series.

Parameters

  • true_series – The series to match.

  • pred_series – The predicted values.

Returns

The computed MASE.

u8timeseries.metrics.overall_percentage_error(true_series: u8timeseries.timeseries.TimeSeries, pred_series: u8timeseries.timeseries.TimeSeries) → float[source]¶

Computes the Overall Percentage Error (OPE) of true_series and pred_series.

Parameters

  • true_series – The series to match.

  • pred_series – The predicted values.

Returns

The computed OPE.
